original: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati—
analyzed: ▁ek adhammo ▁bhikkhave ▁bhāvit o ▁bahulīkat o ▁ubho ▁atthe ▁sam a dhi g ayh a ▁tiṭṭhati
▁diṭṭhadhamm i k añceva ▁atthaṃ ▁sampa rā yi k añca

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati—
analyzed: ▁ayaṃ ▁kho ▁bhikkhave ▁ek adhammo ▁bhāvit o ▁bahulīkat o ▁ubho ▁atthe ▁sam a dhi g ayh a ▁tiṭṭhati
▁diṭṭhadhamm i k añceva ▁atthaṃ ▁sampa rā yi k añcāti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
